metadata.title: Evaluate whether all the JUNOS XML line test type is supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to version if the interpreter properly supports all the junos-def:XXX_test types and all of their valid operations.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the xml_line_object is supported.

xml_line_test.comment: Test that the line_object is supported.
